name: GrapePololipseDemo
description:
Your are in a world where grapes are zombies and are the last orange standing fight your way though many enemies and getting some upgrades along the way. However you must conserve  your juice (Ammo/Orange Bar) to survive

this was for trijam 181

 Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Space to dash
  • E to pick upgrades
    •  Directions to  download the game
    • Download .zip file
    • Place in a folder on you desktop
    • Right click > Extract Here
    • Double click on GrapePoloLispe.exe
    Mac

    If the game doesn't work after unzipping, try to use another unarchiver program. The Unarchiver is one for example.

    Linux

    Right click > Properties > Permissions and tick "Allow this application to run as a program"
